title: Tor Slotmann
content:
**Tor Slotmann** is a danish designer who graduated as a graphic designer from Danmarks Designskole in 2004. He works as a freelance designer with type and identity design. He graduated with _integritype_ – a typeface for signage in a hospital. He is currently developing identities and typefaces for various clients.

[www.torslotmann.dk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101043830/http:/www.torslotmann.dk/ "www.torslotmann.dk")
author: tor_slotmann
